glsa.title: Kazehakase: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities in Kazehakase could result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Kazehakase is a web browser based on the Gecko engine.

description.p: Kazehakase includes a copy of PCRE which is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows and memory corruptions vulnerabilities (GLSA 200711-30).

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open specially crafted input (e.g bookmarks) with Kazehakase, which could possibly lead to the execution of arbitrary code, a Denial of Service or the disclosure of sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
